item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: clayton
item.content:encoded:
Pricing

Free forever. Powerful Upgrade Options.

Starter
$0/mo

  • 5 Devices
  • 1 month cloud retention
  • Unlimited notifications
  • Basic integrations
  • Always free

Pro
$12/mo

  • Unlimited Devices
  • 1 year cloud retention
  • Unlimited notifications
  • Advanced integrations
  • Priority Customer Support

Have commercial needs? Drop us a line.
